summary:
This mod add a complete Heavy armor and weapons set.

All the set have daedric stat. and craftable at forge under deadric item.
You can enchant or improve all armor and weapons.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://www.doodaboom.com/skyrim/titre_lordarmor.png[/img]

[b][color=#FF6600]This mod add a complete Heavy armor and weapons set.[/color][/b]

All the set have daedric stat. and craftable at forge under deadric item.
You can enchant or improve all armor and weapons.

Unfortunatly, there\'s no Helmet, and Hooded Helmet for Khajiit and Argonian
so those are replaced by basic hood. 
_______________________________________________________________________________

[color=#99CC00]ITEMS LIST :[/color]

Boots - Version 1,2 & 3
Gauntlets
Cuirass
Cuirass with Cape
Helmets - half and full
Hood
Helmet with hood
Shield

Sword
Greatsword
__________________________________________________________________________

[color=#99CC00]MY OTHER MODS :[/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7109][img]http://www.doodaboom.com/skyrim/titre_scoutarmor_sml.png[/img][/url]

__________________________________________________________________________

I would like to thx :

Gilead Maerlyn for this Capeless Nightingale used in this set :
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1560]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1560[/url]

DoubleBrewski for Greatsword sheaths and scabbards used in this set too :
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5624]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5624[/url]

Abakus for Better Looking Ebony Helmet used for full helmet :
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4131]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4131[/url]

Eriko for the great screenshots :)
And of course MMOxReview, Chayification & Dohvakin1 for the great Reviews :)
__________________________________________________________________________

Last but not least :

I know that you guys love new armors and stuff 
and are mad when they don\'t work or get bugged...
Making mod is a loooong process with a LOT of complicated parts 
and we need a lot of concentration and time to manage to do something 
that we want to share with you :)
I spend for example more than one week to make the scout armor besides job life etc. 
I didn\'t actually launch Skyrim for \"playing\" since 5 weeks (only for mod testing) 
and has i can remember i\'m not working for Bethesda (it will be a pleasure) :)

So all that to say that i\'m really sorry if this mod may bug / cheat / what else :)
I\'m doing my best to fullfill your desire you my friends :)

Peace :)

[url=http://www.doodaboom.com][img]http://www.doodaboom.com/skyrim/doodaboom.png[/img][/url][/center]
author: DoODABoOM
